rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature without a bounty counter on it.
Whenever a creature with a bounty counter on it dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you and each opponent who didn’t control that creature draws a card and creates a Food token.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Behemoth Burger: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Behemoth Burger, choose up to one for each Beast you control. [i](You may only choose each mode once.)[/i]
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.
• Discard a card, then draw two cards.
